Rope.name: Rope
Rope.description:
As a Utilize action, you can tie a knot with Rope if you succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. The Rope can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check.

You can bind an unwilling creature with the Rope only if the creature has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition. If the creature's legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained condition until it escapes. Escaping the Rope requires the creature to make a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check as an action.

Ball Bearings.name: Ball Bearings
Ball Bearings.description:
As a Utilize action, you can spill Ball Bearings from their pouch. They spread to cover a level, 10-foot-square area within 10 feet of yourself. A creature that enters this area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Prone] condition. It takes 10 minutes to recover the Ball Bearings.

Foundry Note

The Recover Ball Bearings activity grants another use of this item.

Plate Armor.name: Plate Armor
Plate Armor.description: While wearing this armor, you have Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Cloak of Billowing.name: Cloak of Billowing
Cloak of Billowing.description:
Wondrous Item, Common

While wearing this cloak, you can take a Bonus Action to make it billow dramatically for 1 minute.

Clockwork Amulet.name: Clockwork Amulet
Clockwork Amulet.description:
Wondrous Item, Common

This copper amulet contains tiny interlocking gears and is powered by magic from Mechanus, a plane of clockwork predictability. Faint ticking and whirring noises emanate from within.

When you make an attack roll while wearing the amulet, you can forgo rolling the d20 to get a 10 on the die. Once used, this property can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Forgo Roll.name: Forgo Roll
Forgo Roll.condition: you make an attack roll while wearing the amulet

Clothes of Mending.name: Clothes of Mending
Clothes of Mending.description:
Wondrous Item, Common

This elegant outfit magically mends itself to counteract daily wear and tear. Pieces of the outfit that are destroyed can’t be repaired in this way.

Dread Helm.name: Dread Helm
Dread Helm.description:
Wondrous Item, Common

While you’re wearing this fearsome steel helm, your eyes glow red and the rest of your face is hidden in shadow.

Pole of Collapsing.name: Pole of Collapsing
Pole of Collapsing.description:
Wondrous Item, Common

This item functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}. While holding it, you can take a Magic action to collapse it into a 1-foot-long rod for ease of storage (the pole’s weight doesn’t change) or cause the 1-foot-long rod to revert to a Pole. The rod elongates only as far as the surrounding space allows.

Potion of Fire Breath.name: Potion of Fire Breath
Potion of Fire Breath.description:
Potion, Uncommon

After drinking this potion, you can take a Bonus Action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet of yourself. The target makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed.

This potion’s orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.

Potion of Healing.name: Potion of Healing
Potion of Healing.description: As a Bonus Action, you can drink this potion or administer it to another creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that drinks the magical red fluid in this vial regains 2d4 + 2 Hit Points.

Borderlands Tabard.name: Borderlands Tabard
Borderlands Tabard.description: While you’re wearing this tabard, NPCs in the Keep on the Borderlands are initially Friendly toward you.

Chaos Bell.name: Chaos Bell
Chaos Bell.description: This bell was found in the Caves of Chaos.

Cultist's Robe.name: Cultist's Robe
Cultist's Robe.description: While wearing this occult outfit, you have Advantage on any ability check you make to impersonate a cultist in the Cult of Chaos.

Fine Furs.name: Fine Furs
Fine Furs.description: Fine furs found within the Hobgoblin Lair.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description:
You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. This bonus is included automatically.

Mastery Property: Sap

If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

hotbPlateArmor10.name: Plate Armor
hotbPlateArmor10.description:
You have a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing this magic armor. This bonus is included automatically.

While wearing this armor, you have Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Potion of Resistance (Necrotic).name: Potion of Resistance (Necrotic)
Potion of Resistance (Necrotic).description: As a Bonus Action, you can drink this potion or administer it to another creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that drinks the potion has Resistance to Necrotic damage for 1 hour.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. This bonus is included automatically.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description:
You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. This bonus is included automatically.

Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.

Spellbook.name: Spellbook
Spellbook.description:
Your spellbook contains the level 1+ spells you know.

When you begin play, choose four spells from among the level 1+ Spell Cards listed on your class board’s “What You Need to Play” section (five if you are level 2, six if you are level 3). These cards make up your prepared spells. Don’t include spells from your Background Card or Species Card.

Put the spells you haven’t prepared in a pile under this card, and stack your prepared spells near your Class Board.

Recommended Spells. The first time you play, prepare these spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageArmor0]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}.

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.description: A fine tapestry sewn with silver and gold threads.

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Holy Water. Target one creature you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10 plus your Dexterity modifier) or take 2d8 Radiant damage if it is a Fiend or an Undead.

Acid.name: Acid
Acid.description: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d6 Acid damage.

Antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
Antitoxin.description: As a Bonus Action, you can drink a vial of Antitoxin to gain Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.

Healer's Kit.name: Healer's Kit
Healer's Kit.description: As a Utilize action, you can expend one of its uses to stabilize an Unconscious creature that has 0 Hit Points without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check. Then roll [[/r 1d10]]. On a 1, the kit is expended, and you must remove the item from your inventory.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A Lantern casts Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. As a Bonus Action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to Dim Light in a 5-foot radius, or raise it again.

Chain Mail.name: Chain Mail
Chain Mail.description: While wearing this armor you have Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: While wielding this shield, your Armor Class increases by 2 if your class allows you to use a Shield. You can wield only one Shield at a time, and you can’t also wield a weapon with the Two-Handed property.

Splint Armor.name: Splint Armor
Splint Armor.description: While wearing this armor you have Disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Drum.name: Drum
Drum.description: As a Utilize action, you can make a DC 10 Charisma (Performance) check to play a known tune or a DC 15 Charisma (Performance) check to improvise a song with this instrument.

Flute.name: Flute
Flute.description: As a Utilize action, you can make a DC 10 Charisma (Performance) check to play a known tune or a DC 15 Charisma (Performance) check to improvise a song with this instrument.

Lute.name: Lute
Lute.description: As a Utilize action, you can make a DC 10 Charisma (Performance) check to play a known tune or a DC 15 Charisma (Performance) check to improvise a song with this instrument.

Viol.name: Viol
Viol.description: As a Utilize action, you can make a DC 10 Charisma (Performance) check to play a known tune or a DC 15 Charisma (Performance) check to improvise a song with this instrument.

Thieves' Tools.name: Thieves' Tools
Thieves' Tools.description: As a Utilize action, you can make a DC 15 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check to pick a lock or disarm a trap. You have Advantage on the check.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description:
Mastery Property: Nick

When you make the extra attack of the Light property, you can make it as part of the Attack action instead of as a Bonus Action. You can make this extra attack only once per turn.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description:
Mastery Property: Graze

If your attack roll with this weapon misses a creature, you can deal damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. This damage is the same type dealt by the weapon, and the damage can be increased only by increasing the ability modifier.

Hand Crossbow.name: Hand Crossbow
Hand Crossbow.description:
Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description:
Mastery Property: Sap

If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

phbwepMace000000.name: Mace
phbwepMace000000.description:
Mastery Property: Sap

If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

Maul.name: Maul
Maul.description:
Mastery Property: Topple

If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw (DC 10 plus your Strength modifier). On a failed save, the creature has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description:
Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.

phbwepShortbow00.name: Shortbow
phbwepShortbow00.description:
Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.

phbwepShortsword.name: Shortsword
phbwepShortsword.description:
Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description:
Mastery Property: Vex

If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your turn.
